casebody.data:
DISCIPLINARY COUNSEL
v.
KOLIAS 2019-0225 Supreme Court of Ohio. May 30, 2019

CASE ANNOUNCEMENT

DISCIPLINARY CASE

Sua sponte, Marina E. Kolias, Attorney Registration No. 0047529, last known business address in Las Vegas, Nevada, found in contempt for failure to file an affidavit of compliance on or before April 24, 2019.
